name: Temple of Elemental Evil, The
description: This Installer downloads and installs Temple+ 1.0.75
notes: Temple+ is an engine enhancement mod for Troika's Temple of Elemental Evil, including: Fixes for hardcoded bugs, Engine Modernization, UI improvements, and brand new Features!
content:
files:
- patch: https://www.moddb.com/downloads/mirror/100599/122/d8ae76ce1f7c97d395f19add7bc28b1e/?referer=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.moddb.com%2Fgames%2Fthe-temple-of-elemental-evil%2Fdownloads
game:
  arch: win32
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- move:
    description: Moving the Temple+
    dst: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/TemplePlusSetup_v1_0_75.exe
    src: patch
- task:
    description: Running the Temple+
    executable: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/TemplePlusSetup_v1_0_75.exe
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
requires: temple-of-elemental-evil-the
